title: Apache Shirt Font
content:
Any idea what this font is? I've been looking for a while now and can't find anything similar.

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822145351im_/http:/www.dafont.com/forum/attach/orig/4/0/400249.jpg)
author: PimpLucious

comments.content:
Agency is excellent call even if I don't think it's the one. Sample /A counter and /C terminals height are different. Considering the rather inconsistency of letter x-width, I thought it would have been some font by Jeff Levine or a freebie. No chance for the moment.  
Some more alternatives: [Komu](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822145351/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dizajndesign/komu) A, [Proteina](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822145351/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mendoza-vergara/proteina), [Duke](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822145351/http:/www.losttype.com/duke) Fill, [Route 66](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822145351/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/route-66-nf), [Refrigerator Deluxe](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822145351/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/refrigerator-deluxe), [Nicotine](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822145351/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/chank/nicotine), [Nesobrite](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822145351/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/nesobrite)
